title: Deadly Lassa Fever grips Nigeria
text:
Deadly Lassa Fever grips Nigeria   01:31 
Health officials in Nigeria are going out to communities to spread the message about Lassa fever, in an effort to stop the further spread of the virus that has killed over 100 people in the country this year.   
Health officials in Nigeria are going out to communities to spread the message about Lassa fever, in an effort to stop the further spread of the virus that has killed over 100 people in the country this year.  //reut.rs/2pr3ePN
